intro: Oreocharis obovata, commonly known as the broad-ovate oreocharis, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Orchidaceae, commonly known as the orchid family. The plant is characterized by its obovate leaves and small, delicate flowers that often display a range of colors. It typically grows in shaded, moist environments such as forests or mountainous regions. Due to its unique appearance and limited distribution, it is considered a rare and valuable species in botanical studies.
